import React from "react"; import Header from "./Header"; import Main from "./Main"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import PopupWithForm from "./PopupWithForm"; import ImagePopup from "./ImagePopup"; function App() { const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setEditProfilePopupOpen] = useState(false); const [isAddPlacePopupOpen, setAddPlacePopupOpen] = useState(false); const [isEditAvatarPopupOpen, setEditAvatarPopupOpen] = useState(false); return ( <>
); } export default App;
